data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bertolino, Marco, Cerrano, Carlo, Bavestrello, Giorgio, Carella, Mirco, Pansini, Maurizio, Calcinai, Barbara (2013): Diversity of Porifera in the Mediterranean coralligenous accretions, with description of a new species. ZooKeys 336: 1-37, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.336.5139, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.336.5139
